alert.note: Alert for Appomattox; Campbell; Charlotte (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 6:47PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Appomattox, northwestern Charlotte and east central Campbell Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 647 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Darlington Heights, or 8 miles west of Hampden Sydney, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Phenix... Red House... Pamplin City... Madisonville... Mike... Cullen... and Hixburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
